Package arcade.env.comp

Class GraphSitesUtilities

java.lang.Object
arcade.env.comp.GraphSitesUtilities
abstract class GraphSitesUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
Container class for utility functions used by GraphSites.
Since:
2.3
Version:
2.3.21

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static double CAP_EXP
    Exponent for Murray's law

    Tolerance for difference in radii

    Minimum flow rate (in um3/min)

    Minimum flow percent for edge removal

    Hemoglobin hill equation exponent

    Hemoglobin hill equation P50 (in mmHg)

    Maximum oxygen partial pressure (in mmHg)

    Minimum oxygen partial pressure (in mmHg)

    Oxygen partial pressure per radius (in mmHg/um)

    Oxygen saturation in blood (in fmol/um3)

  • Method Details

    • parseType

      static int parseType​(java.lang.String type)
      Parses type letter into code.
      Parameters:
      type - the type letter
      Returns:
      the type code

    • calcPressure

      static double calcPressure​(double radius, int type)
      Calculates node pressure for a given radius.

      Equation based on the paper: Welter M, Fredrich T, Rinneberg H, and Rieger H. (2016). Computational model for tumor oxygenation applied to clinical data on breast tumor hemoglobin concentrations suggests vascular dilatation and compression. PLOS ONE, 11(8), e0161267.

      Parameters:
      radius - the radius of the edge
      type - the edge type
      Returns:
      the edge pressure

    • calcViscosity

      private static double calcViscosity​(double radius)
      Calculates relative viscosity for a given radius.

      Equation based on the paper: Pries AR, Secomb TW, Gessner T, Sperandio MB, Gross JF, and Gaehtgens P. (1994). Resistance to blood flow in microvessels in vivo. Circulation Research, 75(5), 904-915.

      Parameters:
      radius - the radius of the edge
      Returns:
      the relative viscosity

    • getCoeff

      private static double getCoeff​(GraphSites.SiteEdge edge)
      Gets flow rate coefficient in units of um3/(mmHg min).
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge
      Returns:
      the flow rate coefficient

    • getPartial

      static double getPartial​(GraphSites.SiteEdge edge)
      Gets the oxygen partial pressure for an edge.
      Parameters:
      edge - the edge
      Returns:
      the oxygen partial pressure

      private static double getSaturation​(double pressure)
      Gets the oxygen saturation at a given partial pressure.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the oxygen saturation

    • getTotal

      static double getTotal​(double pressure, double solubility)
      Gets the total amount of oxygen in blood (fmol/um3).
      Parameters:
      pressure - the oxygen partial pressure
      solubility - the oxygen solubility in blood
      Returns:
      the total amount of oxygen

    • getRootPressure

      private static double getRootPressure​(java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.Root> roots, int type)
      Gets the maximum (for arteries) or minimum (for veins) pressure across roots.
      Parameters:
      roots - the list of roots
      type - the root type
      Returns:
      the root pressure

    • setRootPressures

      static double setRootPressures​(java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.Root> roots, int type)
      Sets the pressure of roots.

      Method assumes that the root node has already been set to the correct node object.

      Parameters:
      roots - the list of roots
      type - the root type
      Returns:
      the pressure assigned to the roots

    • setLeafPressures

      static void setLeafPressures​(Graph G, double arteryPressure, double veinPressure)
      Sets the pressure of leaves.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      arteryPressure - the pressure at the arteries
      veinPressure - the pressure at the veins

    • reversePressures

      static boolean reversePressures​(Graph G)
      Reverses edges that have negative pressure differences.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      Returns:
      true if any edges were reversed, false otherwise

    • checkPerfused

      static void checkPerfused​(Graph G, java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.Root> arteries, java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.Root> veins)
      Marks edges that perfused between given arteries and veins.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      arteries - the list of arteries
      veins - the list of veins

    • mergeGraphs

      static void mergeGraphs​(Graph g1, Graph g2)
      Merges the nodes from one graph with another graph.
      Parameters:
      g1 - the first graph object
      g2 - the second graph object

    • calcPressures

      static void calcPressures​(Graph G)
      Calculates pressures at nodes.

      Sets up a system of linear equations for the current graph structure using mass balances at each node.

      Parameters:
      G - the graph object

    • calcStress

      static void calcStress​(Graph G)
      Calculates shear and circumferential stress for all edges.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object

    • calcFlows

      static void calcFlows​(Graph G, GraphSites gs)
      Calculates flow rate (in um3/min) and area (in um2) for all edges.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      gs - the graph sites object

    • calcThicknesses

      static void calcThicknesses​(Graph G)
      Calculate the wall thickness (in um) for all edges.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object

    • calcRadius

      private static java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.SiteEdge> calcRadius​(Graph G, GraphSites.SiteEdge edge, int dir, int node, int fromcheck, int tocheck)
      Calculate the radii (in um) using Murray's law.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      edge - the starting edge for the calculation
      dir - the direction of the calculation
      node - the selected node of the edge
      fromcheck - the number of edges in to the selected node
      tocheck - the number of edges out of the selected node
      Returns:
      the list of children edges

    • assignRadius

      private static java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.SiteEdge> assignRadius​(Graph G, GraphSites.SiteEdge edge, int dir, int node, int fromcheck, int tocheck)
      Assigns the radii (in um) using Murray's law without splits.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      edge - the starting edge for the calculation
      dir - the direction of the calculation
      node - the selected node of the edge
      fromcheck - the number of edges in to the selected node
      tocheck - the number of edges out of the selected node
      Returns:
      the list of children edges

    • visit

      static void visit​(Graph G, GraphSites gs, GraphSites.SiteNode node, int splitCol, int splitRow)
      Traverses through the graph and marks visited nodes.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      gs - the graph sites object
      node - the starting node for the traversal
      splitCol - the column in the pattern layout
      splitRow - the row in the pattern layout

    • path

      private static void path​(Graph G, GraphSites.SiteNode start, GraphSites.SiteNode end)
      Uses Dijkstra's algorithm to find path between given nodes.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      start - the start node
      end - the end node

    • traverse

      private static void traverse​(Graph G, GraphSites.SiteNode start, java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.SiteEdge> path)
      Traverses through graph to find perfused paths.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      start - the start node
      path - the list of edges in the path

    • updateRadii

      static void updateRadii​(Graph G, java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.SiteEdge> list, int code)
      Updates radii for the graph using Murray's law without variation.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      list - the list of edges
      code - the update code

    • updateRadii

      static void updateRadii​(Graph G, java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.SiteEdge> list, int code, GraphSites gs)
      Updates radii for the graph using Murray's law.

      The graph sites object contains an instance of a random number generator in order to ensure simulations with the same random seed are the same.

      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      list - the list of edges
      code - the update code
      gs - the graph sites object

    • updateGraph

      static void updateGraph​(Graph G, GraphSites gs)
      Updates hemodynamic properties in the graph after edges are removed.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      gs - the graph sites object

    • updateTraverse

      static void updateTraverse​(Graph G, GraphSites gs, java.util.LinkedHashSet<GraphSites.SiteNode> nodes, boolean removeMin)
      Iterates through nodes to eliminate low flow edges preventing graph traversal.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      gs - the graph sites object
      nodes - the set of nodes
      removeMin - true if the the minimum flow edges should be removed, false otherwise

    • getEdgeByType

      static java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.SiteEdge> getEdgeByType​(Graph G, int[] types)
      Gets list of edges of the given types(s).
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      types - the list of edge types
      Returns:
      a list of edges

    • getEdgeByType

      static java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.SiteEdge> getEdgeByType​(Graph G, int[] types, int level)
      Gets list of edges of the given type(s) for the given level.
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      types - the list of edge types
      level - the graph resolution level
      Returns:
      a list of edges

    • getLeavesByType

      static java.util.ArrayList<GraphSites.SiteEdge> getLeavesByType​(Graph G, int[] types)
      Gets list of leaves of the given type(s).
      Parameters:
      G - the graph object
      types - the list of edge types
      Returns:
      a list of leaves
